section.title: Removing a Virtual Machine Network Quality of Service Entry
section.para: Remove an existing virtual machine network quality of service entry.

procedure.title: Removing a Virtual Machine Network Quality of Service Entry

step.para: Click the Data Centers resource tab and select a data center.
Click the QoS tab in the details pane.
Select the virtual machine network quality of service entry to remove.

section.para: You have removed the virtual machine network quality of service entry, and that entry is no longer available.
